H0.text: It covers the bedrock layer in the earth, which is why it is important to protect soil.

H1.text: It has nutrients used by plants to grow, which is why it is important to protect soil.

H2.text: It holds many harmful pollutants, so protecting soil is important.

H3.text: It dries quickly in sunlight is why it is important to protect soil.

A4.text: Soil health sustains plant and animal productivity.

A5.text: A healthy soil prevents the accumulation of contaminants.
